DOC.brief_title: Short-course Out-patient Pulmonary Rehabilitation COPD Exacerbations
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) disease significant morbidity incurs heavy utilization healthcare resource . The direct cost hospital admission relate COPD single large source expenditure public hospital system . This study assess whether short course pulmonary rehabilitation programme periodic reinforcement exercise train phone call reminder would help increase physical activity COPD patient also decrease readmission AECOPD . Hypothesis : The programme reduce readmission AECOPD Design : Randomised control trial . Patients randomise intervention usual care group Subjects : Patients discharge hospital episode acute exacerbation COPD Study instrument : Activity monitor , quality life questionnaire Interventions : The Intervention group receive short course pulmonary rehabilitation train out-patient physiotherapy department 4-8 session , 2 hour time , 1-2 time weekly . The training schedule way subject would least 4-8 week supervise training trained physiotherapist . Home exercise taught case manager give phone call subject every 2 week provide support reinforcement continuous exercise home one year . Patients invited attend reinforcement out-patient physiotherapy train month every 2 month willing attend .
DOC.criteria: Patients COPD exacerbation 1 . History asthma , lung resection significant pulmonary disease like pulmonary fibrosis . 2 . Active infection like pulmonary tuberculosis 3 . Unable complete assessment due physical and/or cognitive impairment 4 . Completed pulmonary rehabilitation program previous 24 month . 5 . Having short life expectancy like subject terminal malignancy intractable heart failure
